channel.title: [562/659] AtomicScape Remake! [ASR]
channel.description:
-August 31st, 2011
I just starting thinking today as to how much fun AtomicScape was, and some of the bugs and glitches it had as well, such as you can't bank in certain modes etc.
I also started to think about how outdated just a basic 562 is, and that if hostess want to attract players, to do it with new items, mapdata, graphics etc. Because, noone wants to play a basic 562, that lags out when u Try to change your magic book on it, all of these bugs will be fixed!
Well I myself have decided to test just how good of a coder I really am, and I have decided to remake it, but with the 562 loading 659 era. I will make home castle wars like it was :p Make portals take you to same places, make place pking ofcourse!, and red ofcourse you will get the person you kill's loot! I myself think remake's are wonderful!
As I now am going to do my own, don't start calling this a leech, many bugs will be fixed, and shops will be at home so you do not have to do the ::buy command etc. you will use pk points to buy stuff also Starter will be automatic upon login, aswell as combat level 138, I will add two altars to home, one to change your Mage books, and one to change your prayer book into curses! Yes you will get pk points upon killing somebody! Aswell as drops, in wilderness you will get the loot of the killed person, I will try to make protect 1 item prayer/curse work! I will keep the original starter that everyone loved!, I will also make you start with some vengeance runes suitable for 40 castings. Expect much more npc's to fight, aswell as this which no other 562+ as far as I know of has managed to obtain: vengeance on npc! Yes I said it, vengeance on npc! 1 click npc interacting. Same staffzone AtomicScape had, I will be updated this topic daily, more than likely multidaily but I cannot promise. I will be adding pictures.
FAQ's - Q: May I suggest something you could add? A: Ofcourse you can!
Q: Are you going to make it pk based or just say you will, and end up making it like any other server? A: Well, to answer your question, it will be pk based, with some npc's like AtomicScape had, with a few more, but mostly pking like AtomicScape!
Q: Didn't you quit? A: No, thanks to everyone who persuaded me not to!
Q: Will you Release? A: Yes :)

item.title: [562/659] AtomicScape Remake! [ASR]
item.dc:creator: @austin_cadle austin cadle
item.description:
@austin_cadle wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:19, topic:412965”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=514437.msg3736331#msg3736331 date=1314996453]

What happened to your runescape remake?

Waiting for a blank 377 with source and client.
Without stupid stuff at top like file etc.

Seriously? All you have to do is remove like 2 lines to get rid of that…
[/quote]

Genius.

Austin, if you want to excel in programming. Drop the 562/loading junk. You won’t learn anything from it. Either A) Make a new revision and learn from reading the client, and writing your content from scratch, or B) Start with a released revision not commonly used and create content from scratch.

I don’t know what your plans are for a career ect, but if you are looking to learn. 562 isn’t really your bag of education :p[/quote]
Yeah =/
Idk how ik so much about rsps’s when I didn’t start coding til November and didn’t really learn it til’ June

Read full topic

item.title: [562/659] AtomicScape Remake! [ASR]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:13, topic:412965”][quote author=austin cadle link=topic=514437.msg3735345#msg3735345 date=1314916585]

What happened to your runescape remake?

Waiting for a blank 377 with source and client.
Without stupid stuff at top like file etc.
[/quote]

Seriously? All you have to do is remove like 2 lines to get rid of that…[/quote]

Genius.

Austin, if you want to excel in programming. Drop the 562/loading junk. You won’t learn anything from it. Either A) Make a new revision and learn from reading the client, and writing your content from scratch, or B) Start with a released revision not commonly used and create content from scratch.

I don’t know what your plans are for a career ect, but if you are looking to learn. 562 isn’t really your bag of education

Read full topic
